title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT - VENUS MEETS THE SON OF HERCULES / THE SON OF HERCULES IN THE LAND OF DARKNESS

sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD. Custom menu with a photo of the title character and drive-in style audio.Â  SIMPLE BURN INSTRUCTIONS: Download the zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO_TS folder and burn to disc, that's the easiest way. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This disc contains the movies VENUS MEETS THE SON OF HERCULES & THE SON OF HERCULES IN THE LAND OF DARKNESS, along with the preview and intermission reels. NOTE: IGNORE THE URL AND THE IDENTIFIER AS I HAVE DELETED THOSE FILES AND REPLACED THEM WITH NEW ONES
